full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL DKAR MA'I PHYAG MCHOD LAS BZHIR 'BREL BA'I MAndAL BZHI PA'I CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (SMRAS PA SNYIGS DUS HA CANG SPAGS PA'I DBANG, ,CHOS PHYOGS PA RNAMS PHYI NANG NYER 'TSES GTZES, ,BSTAN 'DZIN SPEL SKYONG SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS, ,'PHRIN LAS DAR CHUNG SNYAN GRAGS MI CHE STE, ,CHOS LTAR BCOS PA SDIG SPYOD SKYE BO KUN, ,DPAL 'BYOR MTHON POR 'TSEL BA'I DUS NGAN 'DIR, ,RTOGS LDAN MKHAS RNAMS 'DI DON MYO BAS GRUB, ,DE PHYIR BSTAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN SKU TSE DANG, ,'PHRIN LAS YAR 'PHEL SPYI DANG BYE BRAG TU, ,KHYAD PAR BLO GSAR PA DANG CHOS KYI RKYEN, ,TSANG BSKYED SBYIN BDAG SPYI LA DMIGS PA RU, ,'JAM BZHAD RIN PO CHE SOGS DAM PA GONG, ,GSUNG RGYUN RNAMS DANG LTOS MTHUN BDE 'KHYER CHOG ,GYI NAR PA SU MA TI SH'E LA MING, ,RANG NYID KHO NA'I RGYUN 'KHYER KHA BTON DU, ,BRIS 'DI BLO BZANG RGYAL BSTAN MCHOD YON PHUL,, ,,)
author_simple: SU MA TI SH'E LA MING,
